1.0.name: wordpress/easy-wp
1.0.description:
Easy WP turns your wordpress-admin into a super-simple CMS. It allows your clients to easily edit there pages and content. Next to that it can tap into tap into google analytics reports thanks to imthiaz, so your clients can check there website stats themselves.

This isn't a plugin to make developers' lives easier. It's for your clients, the ones you are building a small (pages only) website for.

Easy WP is the brainchild of collaboration between To Wonder multimedia and Motief:Collectief. We use it for every small website, that needs a simple admin. If you're interested in extending the simple CMS, please contact us at http://www.easy-wp.com, we are working on Easy-WP capable plugins like news, small webshop, portfolio, gallery, but we'll be charching a small amount of money for those extra functionalities.
